Key Match Events: Pete Crow-Armstrong advanced to third on a botched pickoff throw and scored on a hit by Ian Happ
Isaac Paredes singled with the bases full to score Cody Bellinger
Hoerner plated two runs with a hit
Miguel Amaya doubled home a pair in the 9th inning
Pre-Game Insights: The Cubs' offense continued to put up huge numbers in September
Sloppy Nationals defense opened the door for the Cubs early
Post-Match Reflections: The Cubs completed their second consecutive sweep and extended their winning streak to six games
The Cubs are starting to make themselves noticeable in the playoff race
The road will get tougher for the Cubs after they play the Pirates at Wrigley with the Yankees and Dodgers looming
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jordan Wicks made his first start since June 14
Paredes made a diving stab on a Keibert Ruiz grounder and fired from his knees to start a 5-4-3 double play
